sourcesContent:
export const responsibilitySuggestions = {
  // Software Engineering Roles
  'Software Engineer': [
    'Developed and maintained scalable web applications using modern frameworks',
    'Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions',
    'Implemented RESTful APIs and microservices architecture',
    'Conducted code reviews and mentored junior developers',
    'Optimized application performance reducing load time by 40%',
    'Participated in agile ceremonies and sprint planning sessions',
    'Wrote unit and integration tests achieving 85% code coverage',
    'Debugged and resolved production issues ensuring minimal downtime'
  ],
  
  'Senior Software Engineer': [
    'Led development of enterprise-level applications serving millions of users',
    'Architected scalable solutions and established coding best practices',
    'Mentored team of 5+ junior engineers improving overall productivity',
    'Designed and implemented microservices architecture reducing system complexity',
    'Collaborated with product managers to define technical roadmap',
    'Optimized database queries improving response time by 60%',
    'Conducted technical interviews and evaluated potential candidates',
    'Implemented CI/CD pipelines automating deployment processes'
  ],
  
  'Full Stack Developer': [
    'Built responsive web applications using React, Node.js, and MongoDB',
    'Developed RESTful APIs handling 10K+ requests per day',
    'Implemented authentication and authorization using JWT',
    'Designed and optimized database schemas for better performance',
    'Created reusable UI components improving development efficiency',
    'Integrated third-party APIs and payment gateways',
    'Deployed applications on AWS using Docker and Kubernetes',
    'Maintained comprehensive technical documentation'
  ],
  
  'Frontend Developer': [
    'Developed responsive and accessible user interfaces using React and TypeScript',
    'Implemented state management using Redux and Context API',
    'Optimized web performance achieving 95+ Lighthouse scores',
    'Collaborated with UX designers to implement pixel-perfect designs',
    'Created reusable component library following design system',
    'Integrated RESTful and GraphQL APIs',
    'Implemented responsive designs ensuring cross-browser compatibility',
    'Conducted A/B testing to improve user engagement'
  ],
  
  'Backend Developer': [
    'Designed and developed RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express',
    'Implemented database schemas and optimized complex queries',
    'Built authentication and authorization systems with JWT and OAuth',
    'Integrated third-party services and payment gateways',
    'Implemented caching strategies using Redis improving response time',
    'Developed microservices architecture using Docker and Kubernetes',
    'Set up monitoring and logging using ELK stack',
    'Ensured API security following OWASP guidelines'
  ],
  
  // Cloud & DevOps Roles
  'Cloud Engineer': [
    'Designed and deployed cloud infrastructure on AWS/Azure/GCP',
    'Implemented Infrastructure as Code using Terraform and CloudFormation',
    'Optimized cloud costs reducing expenses by 30%',
    'Set up monitoring and alerting using CloudWatch and Datadog',
    'Implemented auto-scaling and load balancing for high availability',
    'Managed CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitLab CI',
    'Ensured security compliance and implemented IAM policies',
    'Migrated on-premise applications to cloud platforms'
  ],
  
  'DevOps Engineer': [
    'Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, GitLab, and GitHub Actions',
    'Automated infrastructure provisioning using Terraform and Ansible',
    'Containerized applications using Docker and orchestrated with Kubernetes',
    'Set up monitoring and logging infrastructure using Prometheus and Grafana',
    'Improved deployment frequency by 50% through automation',
    'Implemented infrastructure security scanning and vulnerability assessment',
    'Managed AWS/Azure cloud infrastructure and cost optimization',
    'Collaborated with development teams to streamline release processes'
  ],
  
  'Site Reliability Engineer (SRE)': [
    'Maintained 99.9% uptime for production systems serving millions of users',
    'Implemented monitoring and alerting using Prometheus and Grafana',
    'Automated incident response reducing MTTR by 40%',
    'Conducted capacity planning and performance optimization',
    'Developed disaster recovery and backup strategies',
    'Implemented chaos engineering practices to improve system resilience',
    'Created runbooks and documentation for operational procedures',
    'Collaborated with development teams on reliability improvements'
  ],
  
  // Data & AI Roles
  'Data Scientist': [
    'Developed machine learning models achieving 92% accuracy',
    'Analyzed large datasets using Python, SQL, and R',
    'Built predictive models for customer behavior analysis',
    'Created data visualizations and dashboards using Tableau and PowerBI',
    'Collaborated with stakeholders to identify business insights',
    'Implemented A/B testing frameworks for product optimization',
    'Deployed ML models to production using Flask and Docker',
    'Conducted statistical analysis and hypothesis testing'
  ],
  
  'Data Engineer': [
    'Designed and built ETL pipelines processing 100M+ records daily',
    'Developed data warehousing solutions using Snowflake and Redshift',
    'Implemented real-time data streaming using Apache Kafka',
    'Optimized SQL queries improving performance by 70%',
    'Built data quality monitoring and validation frameworks',
    'Automated data pipeline orchestration using Apache Airflow',
    'Integrated multiple data sources into unified data lake',
    'Ensured data security and compliance with regulations'
  ],
  
  'Data Analyst': [
    'Analyzed business data to identify trends and opportunities',
    'Created interactive dashboards using Tableau and Power BI',
    'Performed statistical analysis and data visualization',
    'Collaborated with stakeholders to define KPIs and metrics',
    'Generated reports and presentations for executive leadership',
    'Conducted market research and competitive analysis',
    'Automated reporting processes saving 10+ hours weekly',
    'Used SQL and Python for data extraction and analysis'
  ],
  
  'Machine Learning Engineer': [
    'Developed and deployed ML models using TensorFlow and PyTorch',
    'Implemented recommendation systems improving user engagement by 25%',
    'Built NLP pipelines for text classification and sentiment analysis',
    'Optimized model performance through hyperparameter tuning',
    'Created ML pipelines using MLflow and Kubeflow',
    'Conducted model evaluation and A/B testing',
    'Deployed models to production using REST APIs',
    'Collaborated with data scientists to productionize models'
  ],
  
  // Product & Project Management
  'Product Manager': [
    'Defined product strategy and roadmap aligned with business goals',
    'Conducted market research and competitive analysis',
    'Gathered requirements from stakeholders and customers',
    'Prioritized feature development using data-driven approach',
    'Collaborated with engineering teams on product delivery',
    'Analyzed user metrics and feedback to drive improvements',
    'Managed product backlog and sprint planning',
    'Launched 5+ features resulting in 30% user growth'
  ],
  
  'Project Manager': [
    'Managed end-to-end project lifecycle for multiple initiatives',
    'Coordinated cross-functional teams of 10+ members',
    'Developed project plans, timelines, and resource allocation',
    'Monitored project progress and identified risks proactively',
    'Facilitated daily standups and sprint retrospectives',
    'Ensured projects delivered on time and within budget',
    'Communicated project status to stakeholders regularly',
    'Implemented agile methodologies improving delivery speed'
  ],
  
  'Scrum Master': [
    'Facilitated agile ceremonies including sprint planning and retrospectives',
    'Coached team on scrum practices and continuous improvement',
    'Removed impediments enabling team productivity',
    'Tracked team velocity and sprint metrics',
    'Collaborated with product owners on backlog refinement',
    'Promoted agile best practices across organization',
    'Facilitated conflict resolution and team dynamics',
    'Improved team velocity by 40% through process optimization'
  ],
  
  // Design Roles
  'UI/UX Designer': [
    'Designed user-centric interfaces for web and mobile applications',
    'Conducted user research and usability testing',
    'Created wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups',
    'Collaborated with developers to ensure design implementation',
    'Established and maintained design system and style guides',
    'Improved user engagement by 35% through UX optimization',
    'Conducted A/B testing to validate design decisions',
    'Used Figma, Sketch, and Adobe XD for design work'
  ],
  
  'Product Designer': [
    'Led end-to-end design process from research to implementation',
    'Designed intuitive user experiences for complex workflows',
    'Created interactive prototypes for stakeholder presentations',
    'Conducted user interviews and usability testing',
    'Collaborated with product managers on feature prioritization',
    'Established design systems ensuring consistency',
    'Analyzed user metrics to inform design decisions',
    'Mentored junior designers on best practices'
  ],
  
  // Marketing & Content
  'Marketing Manager': [
    'Developed and executed marketing strategies increasing brand awareness',
    'Managed digital marketing campaigns across multiple channels',
    'Analyzed campaign performance and ROI metrics',
    'Collaborated with sales team to generate qualified leads',
    'Managed marketing budget of $500K+ annually',
    'Created content strategy and editorial calendar',
    'Grew social media following by 150%',
    'Conducted market research and competitive analysis'
  ],
  
  'Digital Marketing Specialist': [
    'Executed SEO and SEM campaigns improving organic traffic by 60%',
    'Managed social media accounts across platforms',
    'Created and optimized email marketing campaigns',
    'Analyzed web analytics using Google Analytics',
    'Developed content marketing strategies',
    'Managed PPC campaigns achieving 3x ROAS',
    'Conducted A/B testing on landing pages',
    'Collaborated with design team on creative assets'
  ],
  
  'Content Writer': [
    'Created engaging content for blogs, websites, and social media',
    'Conducted keyword research and SEO optimization',
    'Wrote technical documentation and user guides',
    'Edited and proofread content ensuring quality standards',
    'Collaborated with marketing team on content strategy',
    'Managed editorial calendar and content pipeline',
    'Increased organic traffic by 80% through SEO content',
    'Researched industry trends to create relevant content'
  ],
  
  // Sales & Customer Success
  'Sales Manager': [
    'Led sales team achieving 120% of quarterly targets',
    'Developed sales strategies and pipeline management',
    'Built and maintained relationships with key clients',
    'Conducted sales presentations and product demonstrations',
    'Negotiated contracts and closed deals worth $2M+',
    'Mentored and trained sales representatives',
    'Analyzed sales metrics and forecasted revenue',
    'Collaborated with marketing on lead generation'
  ],
  
  'Customer Success Manager': [
    'Managed portfolio of 50+ enterprise clients',
    'Achieved 95% customer retention rate',
    'Conducted onboarding and training sessions',
    'Identified upsell and cross-sell opportunities',
    'Resolved customer issues and escalations promptly',
    'Gathered customer feedback for product improvements',
    'Created success plans aligned with client goals',
    'Conducted quarterly business reviews with stakeholders'
  ],
  
  // Security Roles
  'Security Engineer': [
    'Implemented security controls and best practices',
    'Conducted security audits and vulnerability assessments',
    'Monitored security incidents and responded to threats',
    'Developed security policies and procedures',
    'Performed penetration testing and ethical hacking',
    'Implemented identity and access management solutions',
    'Ensured compliance with security standards (ISO, SOC2)',
    'Conducted security awareness training for employees'
  ],
  
  'Cybersecurity Analyst': [
    'Monitored security events using SIEM tools',
    'Investigated and responded to security incidents',
    'Conducted threat intelligence analysis',
    'Performed vulnerability scanning and remediation',
    'Implemented security patches and updates',
    'Developed incident response procedures',
    'Analyzed security logs and identified threats',
    'Collaborated with IT team on security initiatives'
  ],
  
  // QA & Testing
  'QA Engineer': [
    'Developed and executed comprehensive test plans',
    'Performed manual and automated testing',
    'Identified and documented software defects',
    'Collaborated with developers on bug resolution',
    'Created test cases and test scripts',
    'Conducted regression testing for releases',
    'Improved product quality reducing defects by 40%',
    'Used Selenium and Cypress for automation testing'
  ],
  
  'Automation Engineer': [
    'Developed automated test frameworks using Selenium and TestNG',
    'Implemented CI/CD integration for automated testing',
    'Created API test automation using Postman and RestAssured',
    'Reduced manual testing efforts by 70% through automation',
    'Maintained and updated test automation suites',
    'Performed load and performance testing',
    'Generated test reports and metrics',
    'Trained team members on automation best practices'
  ],
  
  // Business & Operations
  'Business Analyst': [
    'Gathered and documented business requirements',
    'Conducted stakeholder interviews and workshops',
    'Created process flows and use case diagrams',
    'Analyzed business processes identifying improvement opportunities',
    'Collaborated with development teams on solution design',
    'Performed gap analysis and feasibility studies',
    'Created functional specifications and user stories',
    'Facilitated UAT and gathered feedback'
  ],
  
  'Operations Manager': [
    'Managed daily operations ensuring efficiency and quality',
    'Developed and implemented operational procedures',
    'Monitored KPIs and performance metrics',
    'Led process improvement initiatives reducing costs by 25%',
    'Managed team of 15+ operations staff',
    'Coordinated cross-functional projects',
    'Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements',
    'Analyzed operational data to drive decision making'
  ],
  
  // HR & Recruitment
  'HR Manager': [
    'Managed recruitment and onboarding processes',
    'Developed HR policies and procedures',
    'Handled employee relations and conflict resolution',
    'Conducted performance reviews and feedback sessions',
    'Implemented employee engagement initiatives',
    'Managed compensation and benefits programs',
    'Ensured compliance with labor laws',
    'Reduced employee turnover by 30% through retention programs'
  ],
  
  'Technical Recruiter': [
    'Sourced and recruited top technical talent',
    'Conducted technical screening and interviews',
    'Managed end-to-end recruitment lifecycle',
    'Built talent pipeline for future requirements',
    'Collaborated with hiring managers on job descriptions',
    'Negotiated offers and managed candidate experience',
    'Achieved 90% offer acceptance rate',
    'Reduced time-to-hire by 40% through process optimization'
  ]
};

// Get suggestions for a specific role
export const getResponsibilitiesForRole = (role) => {
  // Direct match
  if (responsibilitySuggestions[role]) {
    return responsibilitySuggestions[role];
  }
  
  // Fuzzy match for similar roles
  const lowerRole = role.toLowerCase();
  for (const [key, value] of Object.entries(responsibilitySuggestions)) {
    if (key.toLowerCase().includes(lowerRole) || lowerRole.includes(key.toLowerCase())) {
      return value;
    }
  }
  
  // Default suggestions
  return [
    'Contributed to team objectives and project deliverables',
    'Collaborated with cross-functional teams',
    'Participated in agile development processes',
    'Maintained high quality standards',
    'Communicated effectively with stakeholders'
  ];
};
